name: Auriok Edgewright
originalText: Metalcraft — Auriok Edgewright has double strike as long as you control three or more artifacts.

rulings.text: If Auriok Edgewright has double strike as the combat damage step begins, there will be a second combat damage step. As that second combat damage step begins, if Auriok Edgewright no longer has double strike (perhaps because an artifact creature you controlled was destroyed), Auriok Edgewright will not assign combat damage a second time.
